articles.author: Emily Stewart
articles.title: America is turning into a nation of return fraudsters - Business Insider
articles.description: Whether it's sending back broken items or claiming a package never arrived, Americans are committing return fraud at Amazon and other retailers.
articles.content: Bill Stewart, the owner of LI Toy and Game on Long Island, New York, estimates that he gets "screwed over" by return shenanigans twice a month. Customers falsely claim an item he shipped wasn't as de… [+11302 chars]

articles.title: 2026 Lexus LC 500 Convertible Heads to America With New Special Edition and Paint Color - autoevolution
articles.description: There is no hybrid option for model year 2026, partly due to abysally poor sales and partly due to the upcoming replacement of the LC
articles.content: Beyond the higher starting price, few things have changed for model year 2026. The paint color palette now comprises eight options, beginning with the Inspiration Series-exclusive Wind. But more on t… [+2684 chars]
